product_name: Eton American Red Cross Clipray Charger
long_description: The compact Eton American Red Cross Clipray Charger is an excellent choice for emergency and outdoor use. It sports hand-cranked power, an LED flashlight, USB cell-phone charger and a carabiner clip. Powerful LED flashlight and convenient USB cell-phone charger are charged by a hand crank that lets you create power in almost any situation. Handy carabiner clip allows you to attach the Eton American Red Cross Clipray Charger to a pack, purse or other objects.
short_description: The compact Eton American Red Cross Clipray Charger is an excellent choice for emergency and outdoor use. It sports hand-cranked power, an LED flashlight, USB cell-phone charger and a carabiner clip.
